alert.note: Alert for Hooker; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 12:28AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hooker, northeastern McPherson and Thomas Counties through 115 AM CDT/1215 AM MDT/... At 1227 AM CDT/1127 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of Tryon, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thedford, Norway and Shimmons Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 201 and 213. Highway 97 between mile markers 42 and 49. Highway 83 between mile markers 137 and 150. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
